languages.text: "Я молюсь за их души. И я молюсь, чтоб Император послал нам встречу с командирами еретиков, виновными в этом зле. Быть орудием праведного отмщения — о что за желанная участь!"

traits.locale_text: "Я молюсь за их души. И я молюсь, чтоб Император послал нам встречу с командирами еретиков, виновными в этом зле. Быть орудием праведного отмщения — о что за желанная участь!"

languages.text: "I pray for their souls. And I pray that the Emperor guides us to the leaders of the heretics guilty of this wicked deed. To be a weapon of righteous retribution would be a destiny beyond imagining!"
languages.original_text: "Я молюсь за их души. И я молюсь, чтоб Император послал нам встречу с командирами еретиков, виновными в этом зле. Быть орудием праведного отмщения — о что за желанная участь!"

traits.locale_text: "I pray for their souls. And I pray that the Emperor guides us to the leaders of the heretics guilty of this wicked deed. To be a weapon of righteous retribution would be a destiny beyond imagining!"
"I pray for their souls. And I pray that the Emperor guides us to the leaders of the heretics guilty of this wicked deed. To be a weapon of righteous retribution would be a destiny beyond imagining!"
"I pray for their souls. And I pray that the Emperor guides us to the leaders of the heretics guilty of this wicked deed. To be a weapon of righteous retribution would be a destiny beyond imagining!"
"I pray for their souls. And I pray that the Emperor guides us to the leaders of the heretics guilty of this wicked deed. To be a weapon of righteous retribution would be a destiny beyond imagining!"

languages.text: “我为他们的灵魂祈祷。我也祈祷帝皇能指引我们，找到犯下这种罪行的异端分子的首领。能够成为伸张正义的武器，这样的命运实在是超乎想象！”
languages.original_text: "I pray for their souls. And I pray that the Emperor guides us to the leaders of the heretics guilty of this wicked deed. To be a weapon of righteous retribution would be a destiny beyond imagining!"

traits.locale_text: “我为他们的灵魂祈祷。我也祈祷帝皇能指引我们，找到犯下这种罪行的异端分子的首领。能够成为伸张正义的武器，这样的命运实在是超乎想象！”

languages.text: «Rezo por sus almas. Y pido al Emperador que nos guíe hasta los líderes de los herejes responsables de un acto tan vil. ¡Ser el instrumento de la justa retribución sería un honor inimaginable!».
languages.original_text: "I pray for their souls. And I pray that the Emperor guides us to the leaders of the heretics guilty of this wicked deed. To be a weapon of righteous retribution would be a destiny beyond imagining!"

traits.locale_text: «Rezo por sus almas. Y pido al Emperador que nos guíe hasta los líderes de los herejes responsables de un acto tan vil. ¡Ser el instrumento de la justa retribución sería un honor inimaginable!».

languages.text: 「彼らの魂のために祈ろう。そして皇帝が、この邪悪な罪を犯した異端者のリーダーのもとへと我らを導いてくれることを祈ろう。正義の報復の武器となることは、想像を絶するような運命なのだ！」
languages.original_text: "I pray for their souls. And I pray that the Emperor guides us to the leaders of the heretics guilty of this wicked deed. To be a weapon of righteous retribution would be a destiny beyond imagining!"

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの魂のために祈ろう。そして皇帝が、この邪悪な罪を犯した異端者のリーダーのもとへと我らを導いてくれることを祈ろう。正義の報復の武器となることは、想像を絶するような運命なのだ！」

languages.text: "Ich bete für ihre Seelen. Und ich bete dafür, dass der Imperator uns zu den Anführern der Ketzer führen wird, die für diese heimtückische Tat verantwortlich waren. Eine Waffe rechtschaffener Vergeltung zu sein, wäre ein unvorstellbares Schicksal!"
languages.original_text: "I pray for their souls. And I pray that the Emperor guides us to the leaders of the heretics guilty of this wicked deed. To be a weapon of righteous retribution would be a destiny beyond imagining!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bete für ihre Seelen. Und ich bete dafür, dass der Imperator uns zu den Anführern der Ketzer führen wird, die für diese heimtückische Tat verantwortlich waren. Eine Waffe rechtschaffener Vergeltung zu sein, wäre ein unvorstellbares Schicksal!"

languages.text: « Je prie pour leurs âmes. Et je prie pour que l'Empereur nous guide vers les chefs des fanatiques responsables de ce sacrilège. Quel destin plus glorieux que de devenir le bras armé de la vengeance ! »
languages.original_text: "I pray for their souls. And I pray that the Emperor guides us to the leaders of the heretics guilty of this wicked deed. To be a weapon of righteous retribution would be a destiny beyond imagining!"

traits.locale_text: « Je prie pour leurs âmes. Et je prie pour que l'Empereur nous guide vers les chefs des fanatiques responsables de ce sacrilège. Quel destin plus glorieux que de devenir le bras armé de la vengeance ! »

languages.text: "Ruhları için dua ediyorum. İmparator'un bizi bu şerre sebep olan kâfirlerin başıyla karşılaştırması için de dua ediyorum. Erdemli intikamın silahı olabilmek, hayallerimin ötesinde bir yazgı olurdu!"
languages.original_text: "I pray for their souls. And I pray that the Emperor guides us to the leaders of the heretics guilty of this wicked deed. To be a weapon of righteous retribution would be a destiny beyond imagining!"

traits.locale_text: "Ruhları için dua ediyorum. İmparator'un bizi bu kötülüğe sebep olan kâfirlerin liderlerine yönlendirmesi için de dua ediyorum. Adaleti sağlayacak bir silah olabilmek, hayallerimin ötesinde bir yazgı olurdu!"

languages.original_text: "I pray for their souls. And I pray that the Emperor guides us to the leaders of the heretics guilty of this wicked deed. To be a weapon of righteous retribution would be a destiny beyond imagining!"
